description:
From our law office in Parkersburg, West Virginia, the attorneys at Powell & Majestro P.L.L.C. serve the rights and interests of a diverse range of clients throughout the state as well as across the country who are dealing with serious and complex legal challenges involving any of the following:
  • Bankruptcy
  • Creditor harassment and unfair or unlawful debt collection practices
  • Personal injury, including oil and gas injuries
  • Traffic violation defense for commercial drivers and CDL holders
  • General litigation and class actions as well as appeals

Backed by our more than 55 years of combined legal experience, the attorneys at our law firm possess the extensive skills and resources necessary to help you resolve your matter and increase your chances of obtaining the favorable outcomes you seek efficiently. We utilize the latest in legal technology, and we maintain a vast network of professional resources we rely on to help us deliver the quality counsel and dedicated support our clients deserve.

As evidence of our success, we have two offices in the state, and we have earned numerous awards and honors for our impeccable professionalism and service. This success is the direct result of the unwavering commitment we have to those we serve, and we have received many positive reviews and referrals from our satisfied clients.

Dedicated to making quality legal representation available to all regardless of their level of wealth, our law firm offers free initial consultations, and we operate on a contingency basis for most matters, which means you will owe us nothing unless we win your case. To begin the process of protecting your rights and interests and securing a brighter future for yourself and your loved ones, we invite you to contact Powell & Majestro P.L.L.C. to speak with one of our dedicated attorneys.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the Bankruptcy Code.
